definition: variant of 杯[bei1]/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
poe divination, a traditional Chinese divination method where a pair of crescent-shaped wooden or bamboo blocks is thrown on the ground, with the positions of the blocks determining the divine answer
pair of mussel-shaped objects thrown on the ground for divination purposes
acolyte in charge of incense in a temple
to respect a deity/to pray to a God
to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams
Tudi Gong, the God of the earth
the three sacrificial animals (originally cow, sheep and pig; later pig, chicken and fish)
paper ingots (burned as offerings to the dead)
